posts.text: Starting the new year with hope. Made some goals and feeling motivated to achieve them. Spent time with family which was nice.
Work has been okay this week. Nothing special really. Just going through the motions I guess.
Having trouble sleeping lately. Mind keeps racing with thoughts. Feel like I can't turn it off.
Another sleepless night. I keep thinking about all my failures. Why do I always mess things up? Everything feels pointless.
I don't see the point anymore. Nothing I do matters. I'm just a burden to everyone around me. So tired of feeling this way.
Stayed in bed all day. Couldn't find the energy to do anything. What's even the point of trying when nothing ever works out?
